articles.title: LIC Share Price: India's largest insurer to see 126.5 crore shares become eligible for trade on Monday - CNBCTV18
articles.description: As of Sunday's closing price, LIC shares are down 36% from their IPO price, 18-months after listing. The government continues to hold the remaining 96.5% stake in the company.
